metadata.title: React Native Finland | Meetups, Developers & Tutorials
metadata.description: The React Native community in Finland. Join Helsinki meetups, hire Finnish RN developers, learn from the University of Helsinki MOOC, and read practical tutorials.
metadata.homeTitle: React Native Finland | Build Cross-Platform Apps with the Finnish Community
metadata.homeDescription: Join the React Native community in Finland. Helsinki meetups, developer directory, free University of Helsinki MOOC, and tutorials from devs shipping RN apps.

hero.badge: Meetups in Helsinki. Content in English & Finnish.
hero.title: Build React Native apps in Finland
hero.description: The community for developers shipping cross-platform apps from Helsinki to Oulu. Join meetups, learn from the University of Helsinki MOOC, and connect with the devs building RN in the Nordics.

home.introDescription: Finland punches above its weight in mobile. From Nokia's legacy to today's thriving startup scene, Finnish developers have been shipping mobile apps for decades. React Native fits right in — and this community connects the people making it happen.
home.exploreSubtitle: Everything you need to build with RN in Finland

events.title: Meetups
events.description: Technical talks from Finnish RN engineers. Real conversations, free pizza, and actual networking (not the awkward kind).

developers.title: Developer Directory
developers.description: Looking to hire? Need a consultant? Browse vetted React Native specialists based in Finland — or add yourself to get discovered.

articles.title: Tutorials
articles.description: Practical tutorials from devs who ship RN apps daily. Performance, animations, native modules — no fluff.

learn.title: Free MOOC Course
learn.subtitle: University of Helsinki
learn.description: The Mobile Development MOOC is one of the best free React Native courses in the world. Built by the same team behind the famous fullstackopen.com.

community.title: Ship RN apps with us
community.description: Whether you're learning React Native, hiring developers, or just want to geek out about mobile — you're in the right place.

questions.question: How do I join React Native Helsinki meetups?
questions.answer: Join our Meetup.com group at meetup.com/react-native-helsinki to get notified about upcoming events and RSVP. Events are free and open to everyone interested in React Native.

questions.question: Is the University of Helsinki React Native course free?
questions.answer: Yes! The Mobile Development MOOC from the University of Helsinki is completely free. It's built by the same team behind fullstackopen.com and covers React Native from basics to advanced topics.

questions.question: How can I add myself to the developer directory?
questions.answer: Submit a pull request on GitHub to add your profile. You'll need to add your details as a JSON entry in src/data/developers.json including name, expertise, availability, and social links.

questions.question: Can I sponsor React Native Helsinki events?
questions.answer: Yes! We're always looking for sponsors to help with venue costs, food, and drinks. Sponsors get visibility with the Finnish React Native community. Reach out via GitHub or Meetup to discuss.

footer.tagline: Community hub for React Native developers in Finland

articles.pageTitle: Learn React Native | Free Tutorials, MOOC Course & Guides
articles.pageDescription: Learn React Native with the free University of Helsinki MOOC and practical tutorials from Finnish developers. Performance, animations, native modules — real-world guides.
articles.title: Learn React Native in Finland
articles.description: Whether you're completely new to mobile development or looking to deepen your React Native expertise, this page brings together the best learning resources and community-written content available in Finland.
articles.moocTitle: University of Helsinki Mobile Development MOOC
articles.moocDescription: The Mobile Development MOOC from the University of Helsinki is one of the strongest introductions to React Native anywhere in the world. It covers modern JavaScript, key mobile concepts, and hands-on app development.
articles.communityDescription: Articles written by the Finnish React Native community — from tutorials and deep dives to case studies and project write-ups.
articles.heroAlt: React Native Articles and Learning Resources

developers.pageTitle: Hire React Native Developers in Finland | Developer Directory
developers.pageDescription: Find and hire React Native developers, consultants, and engineers based in Finland. Browse the directory or add your profile to get discovered by hiring managers.
developers.title: React Native Developer Directory
developers.description: The go-to list for finding React Native talent in Finland. Whether you're hiring for a project or looking for your next opportunity — this is where Finnish RN developers get discovered.
developers.addDescription: Are you a React Native developer in Finland? Add your profile to get visibility with hiring managers, connect with the community, and showcase your expertise.
developers.forHiringDescription: Looking to build or scale a React Native team in Finland? Browse profiles below or contact us about sponsoring the community to reach more developers.
developers.howToAddDescription: Adding yourself takes 5 minutes. Here's how:

steps.title: Fork the repository
steps.description: Go to github.com/React-Native-Finland/react-native.fi and click 'Fork' to create your own copy.

steps.title: Add your profile
steps.description: Add your entry to src/data/developers.json using the template below.

steps.title: Add your photo
steps.description: Put your headshot in public/images/ (square, at least 400x400px).

steps.title: Open a pull request
steps.description: Submit your changes and we'll review and merge within a few days.

developers.templateDescription: Copy this template and fill in your details:

sponsors.title: Sponsor React Native Helsinki
sponsors.subtitle: Get your brand in front of Finland's React Native community
sponsors.description: React Native Helsinki is the largest React Native meetup in the Nordics. Sponsoring our events gets your company visibility with talented mobile developers, potential hires, and decision-makers building cross-platform apps.

benefits.title: Reach Qualified Developers
benefits.description: Our audience is 100% React Native developers — no noise, just the people building mobile apps in Finland.

benefits.title: Hiring Pipeline
benefits.description: Looking to grow your team? Sponsoring events puts you in front of developers who might be your next hire.

benefits.title: Brand Awareness
benefits.description: Logo placement on event pages, shoutouts during meetups, and mentions in our communications.

benefits.title: Community Goodwill
benefits.description: Supporting the community builds authentic relationships and positions you as a company that gives back.

packages.name: Venue Sponsor
packages.description: Host the meetup at your office

sponsors.ctaDescription: Reach out to discuss sponsorship opportunities. We're flexible and happy to create a package that works for your goals.

testimonials.title: What the Community Says
testimonials.placeholder: We're collecting feedback from our community. Check back soon for testimonials from developers who've attended our meetups and used our resources.
testimonials.contributeDescription: Attended a meetup? Found our tutorials helpful? We'd love to hear from you.

contributeSteps.title: Open a GitHub discussion

contributeSteps.title: Share your experience

contributeSteps.title: Include your details

consulting.pageTitle: React Native Consulting & Development Services in Finland
consulting.pageDescription: Hire React Native consultants and development teams in Finland. Expert mobile app development, migration to React Native, performance optimization, and ongoing support from Finnish developers.
consulting.keywords: React Native consulting, React Native consultants, React Native development Finland, hire React Native developers, React Native consultancy, mobile app development Finland, React Native outsourcing, React Native agency Finland
consulting.title: React Native Consulting in Finland
consulting.subtitle: Connect with experienced React Native consultants and development teams based in Finland. From greenfield apps to migration projects, find the right expertise for your mobile project.
consulting.servicesSubtitle: React Native developers in Finland work across startups, agencies, and enterprise clients. Here's what you can expect.

services.title: New App Development
services.description: Build cross-platform iOS and Android apps from scratch using React Native and Expo. Finnish developers bring deep experience shipping production apps.

services.title: Migration to React Native
services.description: Move your existing native iOS or Android app to React Native. Get a single codebase without sacrificing performance or native feel.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Fix slow renders, reduce bundle size, eliminate jank. Finnish RN specialists will profile your app and implement measurable improvements.

services.title: Code Review & Architecture
services.description: Get expert eyes on your React Native codebase. Architecture reviews, best practices audit, and actionable recommendations.

consulting.whyTitle: Why Hire React Native Consultants from Finland?
consulting.whySubtitle: Finland has a strong tradition in mobile development, from Nokia to today's thriving tech scene.

why.title: Deep Mobile Heritage
why.description: Finnish developers have been building mobile apps since before smartphones. That experience translates to better React Native architecture decisions.

why.title: Timezone-Friendly for Europe
why.description: GMT+2/+3 timezone makes Finland ideal for European clients. Overlap with US East Coast mornings too.

why.title: Strong English Skills
why.description: Finland consistently ranks among the best non-native English speaking countries. Communication is never a barrier.

consulting.developersSubtitle: Our directory lists {count}+ React Native developers based in Finland. Filter by expertise, availability, and specialization.

faq.question: How do I hire a React Native consultant in Finland?
faq.answer: Browse our developer directory to find React Native specialists based in Finland. Each profile includes expertise, availability, and contact information. You can reach out directly or post in our GitHub discussions.

faq.question: What does React Native consulting cost in Finland?
faq.answer: Rates for React Native consultants in Finland typically range from €80-150/hour depending on experience and project scope. Team engagements and longer projects may have different pricing structures.

faq.question: Can Finnish React Native developers work remotely?
faq.answer: Yes. Most React Native consultants in Finland work remotely and are experienced with distributed teams. Finland's timezone (GMT+2/+3) works well for European and US East Coast clients.

faq.question: Should I use React Native or native development?
faq.answer: React Native is ideal when you need to ship on both iOS and Android with a single team. It's used by Meta, Microsoft, Shopify, and thousands of production apps. Our developers can help you evaluate whether React Native fits your specific use case.

consulting.ctaDescription: Find the right React Native expertise for your project. Browse our developer directory or reach out to discuss your needs.
